  • FEES
    Call (07) 55 746 133 for our clinic hours.
[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” transparent_background=”off” allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_padding=”||0px|” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” use_custom_gutter=”off” custom_padding=”||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” allow_player_pause=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” make_equal=”off” parallax_1=”off” parallax_method_1=”off” parallax_2=”off” parallax_method_2=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_blurb admin_label=”Blurb” url_new_window=”off” use_icon=”off” icon_color=”#7EBEC5″ use_circle=”off” circle_color=”#7EBEC5″ use_circle_border=”off” circle_border_color=”#7EBEC5″ image=”http://coastgastroenterology.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/about-man.jpg” icon_placement=”top” animation=”top” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_icon_font_size=”off” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” /][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Dr Walker is a “No Gap Provider”, meaning no out-of-pocket expenses for inpatient care. Some emergency and certain complex procedures may incur an out of pocket fee, however the majority of the overall charge will still be covered by your health fund. If you are covered by Medicare alone, gastroscopies and colonoscopies will incur a small out of pocket fee in addition to the hospital facility fee. Please contact our rooms for further details.

For further information please do not hesitate to contact us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” transparent_background=”off” allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Make Appointment” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” header_font_size=”40px” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_text_color=”#16a39e” text_font_size=”40″ text_font_size_phone=”25″ text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#16a39e” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

• FEES
    Call (07) 55 746 133 for our clinic hours.
Dr Walker is a “No Gap Provider”, meaning no out-of-pocket expenses for inpatient care. Some emergency and certain complex procedures may incur an out of pocket fee, however the majority of the overall charge will still be covered by your health fund. If you are covered by Medicare alone, gastroscopies and colonoscopies will […]
